mapper.select: select c_name from club where c_idx = #{c_idx}
select * from ( select tb.*, rownum rNum from( select g_result, g_ratingmemo from game where g_result is not null and c_idx = #{param1} order by g_date desc ) tb ) where rNum between 1 and 10
select count(*) from clubmember where c_idx=#{c_idx} and cm_check not like 'no'

select g.* from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g.c_idx = #{param1} and g.g_check not like 'no' and to_char(g_date, 'YY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YY-MM-DD') order by g.g_date asc
select c.* from club c inner join game g on c.c_idx = g.c_idx where g.g_num = #{param1} and g.g_check like 'yes'
select count(*) from club c inner join game g on c.c_idx = g.c_idx where g.g_num = #{param1} and g.g_check like 'yes'
select cm_grade from clubmember where c_idx=#{param1} and m_id like #{param2}
select count(*) from clubmember where c_idx=#{param1} and m_id like #{param2}

select g.*, c.c_name from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g.g_num in ( select g_num from game where c_idx=#{c_idx} ) and g.g_check = 'no' and to_char(g_date, 'YY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YY-MM-DD') order by g.g_date
select * from club where c_idx in (select c_idx from game where g_num = #{param1} and g_check not like 'no' and c_idx != #{param2})
select count(*) from club where c_idx in (select c_idx from game where g_num = #{param1} and g_check not like 'no' and c_idx != #{param2})
select m.m_name from clubmember cm inner join member m on cm.m_id = m.m_id where cm.c_idx = #{c_idx} and cm.cm_grade = 'head'
select g.*, c.c_name from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_check = 'no' and to_char(g_date, 'YY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YY-MM-DD') order by g.g_date
select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_birth, m.m_phone, m.m_sex, m.m_addr, cm.cm_grade from member m inner join clubmember cm on m.m_id = cm.m_id where cm.c_idx = #{c_idx} order by length(cm_grade) asc
mapper.update: update clubmember set cm_grade = #{param2} where c_idx = #{param1} and m_id like #{param3}
mapper.select: select count(*) from club
mapper.insert: insert into clubmember values(clubmember_seq.nextval, #{c_idx}, #{m_id}, default, default, default, #{cm_memo})
mapper.delete: delete from gamemember where g_idx = #{g_idx} and m_id like #{m_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gamemember where g_idx = #{g_idx} and m_id like #{m_id}
select * from club c inner join clubmember cm on c.c_idx = cm.c_idx where cm.m_id like #{param1} and cm.cm_check not like 'no'
select count(*) from club c inner join clubmember cm on c.c_idx = cm.c_idx where cm.m_id like #{param1} and cm.cm_check not like 'no'
mapper.insert: insert into clubmember (cm_idx,c_idx,m_id,cm_check,cm_date, cm_grade, cm_memo) values( clubmember_seq.nextval, #{param2}, #{param1}, 'yes', default, 'head', '클럽 생성자' )
mapper.select: select m.*, cm.cm_memo, cm.cm_idx from member m inner join clubmember cm on m.m_id = cm.m_id where cm.c_idx = #{c_idx} and cm.cm_check = 'no'
mapper.update: update clubmember set cm_check = 'yes' where cm_idx = #{param1}
update game set g_check = 'yes' where g_idx = #{g_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from game where g_check = 'no' and g_num = #{g_num}
mapper.select: select * from game where g_idx = #{param1}
select gh.* from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx = g.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_rating is not null

select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as appearance , (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_goal like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as goal from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{param1} and g.g_rating is not null order by goal desc

select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as appearance , (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_assist like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as assist from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{param1} and g.g_rating is not null order by assist desc

select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as appearance , (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_goal like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) + (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_assist like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as point from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{param1} and g.g_rating is not null order by point desc

select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{param1}) as appearance from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{param1} and g.g_rating is not null order by appearance desc
select * from game where c_idx = #{param1} and g_rating is not null
select m.m_name, m.m_birth, m.m_sex, m.m_position, m.m_foot, m.m_pic, m.m_phone from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id where gm.g_idx = #{g_idx}
mapper.update: update game set g_formation = #{param2} where g_idx = #{param1}
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select g2.g_idx, g2.g_score, g2.g_result, g2.g_check, g2.g_date, g2.g_num, (select g1.c_idx from game g1 where g1.g_num = g2.g_num and g1.c_idx != #{param1}) as opc_idx, (select c.c_name from club c inner join game g1 on g1.c_idx = c.c_idx where g1.g_num = g2.g_num and g1.c_idx !=#{param1}) as opc_name from game g2 where c_idx=#{param1} and g_rating is not null order by g2.g_date desc)

select * from ( select tb.*, rownum rnum from( select g2.g_idx, g2.g_score, g2.g_result, g2.g_check, g2.g_date, g2.g_num, (select g1.c_idx from game g1 where g1.g_num = g2.g_num and g1.c_idx != #{param1}) as opc_idx, (select c.c_name from club c inner join game g1 on g1.c_idx = c.c_idx where g1.g_num = g2.g_num and g1.c_idx !=#{param1}) as opc_name from game g2 where c_idx=#{param1} and g_rating is not null order by g2.g_date desc) tb ) where rnum between #{param2} and #{param3}

select * from( select rownum rnum,tb.* from (select c1.c_idx, c1.c_name, c1.c_emb, (select count(*) from game g where g.c_idx = c1.c_idx and g.g_rating is not null) as matches, (select count(*) from game g where g.c_idx = c1.c_idx and g.g_result ='W') as wins, (select count(*) from game g where g.c_idx = c1.c_idx and g.g_result ='D') as draws, (select count(*) from game g where g.c_idx = c1.c_idx and g.g_rating is not null)*2 + (select count(*) from game g where g.c_idx = c1.c_idx and g.g_result ='W')*3 + (select count(*) from game g where g.c_idx = c1.c_idx and g.g_result ='D')*1 as points from club c1 order by points desc) tb ) where rnum between 1 and 10
select * from club c inner join clubmember cm on c.c_idx = cm.c_idx where cm.m_id = #{m_id}
select m.*, cm.cm_idx, cm.cm_date , cm.cm_grade from member m inner join clubmember cm on m.m_id = cm.m_id where cm.c_idx = #{c_idx} order by cm_grade asc

select g.* from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_check not like 'no' and to_char(g.g_date, 'YY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YY-MM-DD') order by g.g_date asc
select g.*, c.c_name from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g.g_num in ( select g_num from game where c_idx=#{c_idx} and g_check ='owner' ) and g.g_check = 'no' order by g.g_date
select * from club where c_idx in (select c_idx from game where g_num = #{param1} and g_check not like 'no' and c_idx != #{param2} )
select count(*) from club where c_idx in (select c_idx from game where g_num = #{param1} and g_check not like 'no' and c_idx != #{param2})
mapper.insert: insert into gamemember (gm_idx, g_idx, m_id) values(gamemember_seq.nextval, #{g_idx}, #{m_id})
delete from gamemember where g_idx = #{g_idx} and m_id like #{m_id}
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, tb.* from (select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as appearance , (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_goal like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as goal from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_rating is not null order by goal desc)tb)

select * from( select rownum rnum, tb.* from (select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as appearance , (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_assist like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as assist from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_rating is not null order by assist desc)tb)

select * from( select rownum rnum, tb.* from (select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as appearance , (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_goal like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) + (select count(*) from goalhistory gh inner join game g on gh.g_idx=g.g_idx where gh_assist like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as point from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_rating is not null order by point desc)tb)

select * from( select rownum rnum, tb.* from (select distinct m.m_name, m.m_pic, (select count(*) from gamemember gm inner join game g on gm.g_idx=g.g_idx where m.m_id like gm.m_id and g.g_rating is not null and g.c_idx = #{c_idx}) as appearance from member m inner join gamemember gm on m.m_id = gm.m_id inner join game g on g.g_idx = gm.g_idx where g.c_idx = #{c_idx} and g.g_rating is not null order by appearance desc )tb)
mapper.update: update game set g_qrcheck = #{g_qrcheck} where g_idx = #{g_idx} and g_check like 'owner'
mapper.select: select g_qrcheck, g_num from game where g_idx=#{g_idx}
select c_name from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g_idx=#{param1}
select c_name from game g inner join club c on g.c_idx = c.c_idx where g_idx = (select g_idx from game where g_num=#{param2} and g_idx !=#{param1})
select count(*) goal from goalhistory where g_idx=#{param1}
select count(*) goal from goalhistory where g_idx = (select g_idx from game where g_num=#{param2} and g_idx !=#{param1})
